actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 20 to 15 the number of quarters of coverage which an individual must generally have had within a specific 10-year period in order to qualify for disability insurance benefits and the disability freeze.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Reduces from 20 to 15 the number of quarters of coverage which an individual must have had within a specified 10-year period in order to qualify for disability insurance benefits and the disability freeze under Title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 20 to 15 the number of quarters of coverage which an individual must generally have had within a specific 10-year period in order to qualify for disability insurance benefits and the disability freeze.
